description.oldValue:
We will be updating the "Manage Access" experience which will offer you additional controls for how recipients access files you’ve shared. "Shared with" list would be an entry point to Manage Access settings.
GA date: October CY2022
description.newValue: We will be updating the "Manage Access" experience which will offer you additional controls for how recipients access files you’ve shared. "Shared with" list would be an entry point to Manage Access settings.
